title: Inspect Dragline Structural Integrity
description: A reliability engineer plans and reviews the results of a non-destructive testing (NDT) inspection on a dragline boom to check for cracks.

tasks.description: Schedule a third-party NDT contractor to perform an ultrasonic inspection on the critical welds of the dragline boom.
tasks.expected_outcome: The inspection is scheduled in the maintenance plan.

tasks.description: Receive the inspection report from the contractor.
tasks.expected_outcome: The NDT report is received and uploaded into the CMMS.

tasks.description: Review the report, which indicates a small crack has been found. Create a high-priority work order for a certified welder to grind out and repair the crack.
tasks.expected_outcome: The report is reviewed, and a repair work order is created to address the defect before it can grow.
